body_html:
1. Your numpy code uses float64s
  2. Your numpy code uses element-wise mutliplication instead of matrix multiplication
  3. Numpy produces the same errors.

https://gist.github.com/elanmart/d441d59f4fec3df36cd51b45384d4241
result: 7.15469010174e-08

body:
1. Your numpy code uses `float64`s
2. Your numpy code uses element-wise mutliplication instead of matrix multiplication
3. Numpy produces the same errors.

https://gist.github.com/elanmart/d441d59f4fec3df36cd51b45384d4241
result: `7.15469010174e-08`

https://gist.github.com/elanmart/3b4f84a824c765dca1df8bb6a18ec9f2
result: `7.456755265593529e-08`
